title: Dethrone
content:
be obtained from Scroll of Dethrone in Karsus section of the Sorcerous Vault. Dethrone is a Lvl 5 Spell from the Necromancy School. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflicting Status Ailments, buff Characters, or interacting with the environment.

Dethrone Information

Description: Shred a foe's very essence by pulling on strands of the Weave. Dealing 10d6 + 20 (30~80) Necrotic Damage. Level: Lvl 5 spell School: Necromancy School Casting Time: Action Range: 30m Requires Concentr
